mapper.select: SELECT m.perms FROM sys_menu m JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = m.id JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.menu_name, m.parent_id, m.url, m.perms, m.type, m.icon, m.sort FROM sys_menu m JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.type IN('0', '1') ORDER BY m.sort
SELECT id, menu_name, parent_id, url, perms, type, icon, sort FROM sys_menu WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu ( menu_name, parent_id, url, perms, type, icon, sort, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time ) VALUES ( #{menuName}, #{parentId}, #{url}, #{perms}, #{type}, #{icon}, #{sort}, #{createBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{updateBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu SET menu_name = #{menuName}, parent_id = #{parentId}, url = #{url}, perms = #{perms}, type = #{type}, icon = #{icon}, sort = #{sort}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
